# Aufgabe

Berechnen Sie die Vorhersagegüte (RMSE) für folgende Lernalgorithmen:

- lineares Modell
- knn (neighbors: tune)

Modellgleichung: `body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm, data = d_train`.

Tunen Sie bei `neighbors` folgende Werte: 5, 10, 15, 20, 35, 30 und betrachten Sie deren Modellgüte.

Nutzen Sie minimale Vorverarbeitung.

Berichten Sie die den RSME.




</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung

## Setup


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_eb0225f982d851550e6d9fbd8c297e58'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
data(penguins, package = "palmerpenguins")
```
:::


## Daten



::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_ae11708be0655fcfcf5930bcd5a5628b'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d <-
  penguins %>% 
  drop_na()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_eb6276f51090edee1d177f828361e58e'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d_split <- initial_split(d)
d_train <- training(d_split)
d_test <- testing(d_split)
```
:::



## Modelle


Lineares Modell:




::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_7354a41c9de10f33f8018b3be35ab6f5'}

```{.r .cell-code}
mod_lin <- linear_reg()

mod_knn <- nearest_neighbor(mode = "regression",
                                  neighbors = tune())
```
:::



## Rezepte


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_da82c33e7ed42c66a892be0b7f15d4b0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rec_basic <- recipe(body_mass_g ~ bill_length_mm, data = d_train) %>% 
         step_normalize(all_predictors())

rec_basic
```
:::



## Resampling


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_74bbfb26dbbba8e5cbabd4759ec6ba16'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rsmpls <- vfold_cv(d_train)
```
:::



## Workflow Set


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_b1ac94ab2f6defaf8f08db2771e411d7'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf_set <-
  workflow_set(
    preproc = list(rec_simple = rec_basic),
    models = list(mod_lm = mod_lin,
                  mod_nn = mod_knn)
  )

wf_set
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A workflow set/tibble: 2 × 4
  wflow_id          info             option    result    
  <chr>             <list>           <list>    <list>    
1 rec_simple_mod_lm <tibble [1 × 4]> <opts[0]> <list [0]>
2 rec_simple_mod_nn <tibble [1 × 4]> <opts[0]> <list [0]>
```
:::
:::


## Tuningparameter-Werte bestimmen

Welche Tuningparameter hatten wir noch mal ausgewiesen?


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_4c0ae7e4fea233d46b2c4f3818a89f45'}

```{.r .cell-code}
mod_knn %>% 
  extract_parameter_set_dials()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Collection of 1 parameters for tuning

 identifier      type    object
  neighbors neighbors nparam[+]
```
:::
:::


Updaten wir die Parameter mit unseren Werten, also min. 5 Nachbarn und max. 20 Nachbarn.




::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_6c209091e1a373cbdcf4e486d5953b96'}

```{.r .cell-code}
params_knn <- 
mod_knn %>% 
  extract_parameter_set_dials() %>% 
  update(neighbors = neighbors(c(5, 20)))

params_knn
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Collection of 1 parameters for tuning

 identifier      type    object
  neighbors neighbors nparam[+]
```
:::
:::


Diese Infos ergänzen wir jetzt in das Workflow-Set-Objekt für den Workflow mit der ID "rec_simple_mod_nn" unter der Spalte "Options":




::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-10_42c415512cc61e8f84a32deea0ffa0a4'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf_set <- 
wf_set %>% 
  option_add(param_info = params_knn, id = "rec_simple_mod_nn")  

wf_set
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A workflow set/tibble: 2 × 4
  wflow_id          info             option    result    
  <chr>             <list>           <list>    <list>    
1 rec_simple_mod_lm <tibble [1 × 4]> <opts[0]> <list [0]>
2 rec_simple_mod_nn <tibble [1 × 4]> <opts[1]> <list [0]>
```
:::
:::




## Fitten



::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_8c1ddaddb91d04dff06317c5bbd40ebc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf_set_fit <-
  wf_set %>% 
  workflow_map(resamples = rsmpls)

wf_set_fit
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A workflow set/tibble: 2 × 4
  wflow_id          info             option    result   
  <chr>             <list>           <list>    <list>   
1 rec_simple_mod_lm <tibble [1 × 4]> <opts[1]> <rsmp[+]>
2 rec_simple_mod_nn <tibble [1 × 4]> <opts[2]> <tune[+]>
```
:::
:::



Check:


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_275167788bfaba7f93803ecacb7eda77'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf_set_fit %>% pluck("result")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[[1]]
# Resampling results
# 10-fold cross-validation 
# A tibble: 10 × 4
   splits           id     .metrics         .notes          
   <list>           <chr>  <list>           <list>          
 1 <split [224/25]> Fold01 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 2 <split [224/25]> Fold02 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 3 <split [224/25]> Fold03 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 4 <split [224/25]> Fold04 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 5 <split [224/25]> Fold05 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 6 <split [224/25]> Fold06 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 7 <split [224/25]> Fold07 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 8 <split [224/25]> Fold08 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 9 <split [224/25]> Fold09 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
10 <split [225/24]> Fold10 <tibble [2 × 4]> <tibble [0 × 3]>

[[2]]
# Tuning results

# A tibble: 10 × 4

   <list>           <chr>  <list>            <list>          
 1 <split [224/25]> Fold01 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 2 <split [224/25]> Fold02 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 3 <split [224/25]> Fold03 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 4 <split [224/25]> Fold04 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 5 <split [224/25]> Fold05 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 6 <split [224/25]> Fold06 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 7 <split [224/25]> Fold07 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 8 <split [224/25]> Fold08 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
 9 <split [224/25]> Fold09 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
10 <split [225/24]> Fold10 <tibble [20 × 5]> <tibble [0 × 3]>
```
:::
:::



## Bester Kandidat


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-13_16ccb6ca9934ef7dffd0c5555152c5ab'}

```{.r .cell-code}
autoplot(wf_set_fit)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){fig-pos='H' width=384}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_5e1be93cc198fd4f068a9686a590f684'}

```{.r .cell-code}
rank_results(wf_set_fit, rank_metric = "rmse") %>% 
  filter(.metric == "rmse")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 11 × 9
   wflow_id         .config .metric  mean std_err     n preprocessor model  rank
   <chr>            <chr>   <chr>   <dbl>   <dbl> <int> <chr>        <chr> <int>
 1 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     632.    19.4    10 recipe       near…     1
 2 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     635.    19.2    10 recipe       near…     2
 3 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     637.    19.6    10 recipe       near…     3
 4 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     638.    18.9    10 recipe       near…     4
 5 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     638.    16.6    10 recipe       line…     5
 6 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     639.    19.5    10 recipe       near…     6
 7 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     645.    19.9    10 recipe       near…     7
 8 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     649.    20.5    10 recipe       near…     8
 9 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     660.    19.3    10 recipe       near…     9
10 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     673.    19.7    10 recipe       near…    10
11 rec_simple_mod_… Prepro… rmse     673.    18.9    10 recipe       near…    11
```
:::
:::



Am besten war das lineare Modell, aber schauen wir uns auch mal das knn-Modell an, v.a. um zu wissen, wie man den besten Tuningparameter-Wert sieht:


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-15_6ce904ffd59a09c7960842c39ae84ce0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf_knn <- 
  extract_workflow_set_result(wf_set_fit, "rec_simple_mod_nn")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-16_dd14cfe1a52724cd6e8e6c9b96d46e0c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf_knn %>% autoplot()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){fig-pos='H' width=384}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-17_3e509eb6e4cd9c7c165c5935c781ac9f'}

```{.r .cell-code}
wf_knn %>% select_best()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: No value of `metric` was given; metric 'rmse' will be used.
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 1 × 2
  neighbors .config              
      <int> <chr>                
1        19 Preprocessor1_Model10
```
:::
:::



## Last Fit


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-18_eaf1f35789dd68ce8c3910c7e0e4ea78'}

```{.r .cell-code}
best_wf <-
  wf_set_fit %>% 
  extract_workflow("rec_simple_mod_lm")
```
:::



Finalisieren müssen wir diesen Workflow nicht, da er keine Tuningparameter hatte.


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-19_02ec71b0413471829feab06b22e34119'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit_final <-
  best_wf %>% 
  last_fit(d_split)
```
:::



## Modellgüte im Test-Set


::: {.cell hash='wfsets_penguins02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-20_a2005a221161babd7edd52995446c325'}

```{.r .cell-code}
collect_metrics(fit_final)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  .metric .estimator .estimate .config             
  <chr>   <chr>          <dbl> <chr>               
1 rmse    standard     698.    Preprocessor1_Model1
2 rsq     standard       0.348 Preprocessor1_Model1
```
:::
:::
